name: billboard_200
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool billboard_v2.
Tool description: Billboard API: Billboard Hot 100, Billboard 200, Artist 100, Billboard Global 200, Top Artists, Year-End Hot 100 Songs, Year-End Billboard Global 200, Year-End Billboard 200 Albums, Year-End Top Artists, Greatest of All Time Artists, Greatest of All Time Songs of the Summer, Greatest of All Time Hot 100 Songs and much more!
API description: Retrieves the Billboard 200 chart for a specified date.

date.description: The date for which to retrieve the Billboard 200 chart, formatted as 'YYYY-MM-DD'.

range.description: The range of chart positions to return (default is '1-10'). Use '1-200' to get all results.
